title: The Dangerous Void Mattis Leaves Behind
description:
Following President Trump's surprise announcement to withdraw U.S. troops from Syria, Secretary of Defense James Mattis made an even more surprising announcement. He was out. David Meyers speaks to Bloomberg's national security reporter Nick Wadhams about the void Gen. Mattis leaves behind and the important foreign policy decisions that are now in limbo.
FOLLOW UP
 Nick's latest report: Mattis’s Exit Takes Leash Off Trump’s ‘America First’ Doctrine
You can follow Nick at: @nwadhams
